item.itemfilters.xor.description: 两个中有一个匹配,但不是全部
item.itemfilters.item_group.description: 使用物品组 /创造模式物品ID
item.itemfilters.custom.description: 需要模组或脚本(通常为KubeJS)
itemfilters.help_text.variants:
Tab, Scroll Wheel, Cursor Up/Down: adjust highlight
Enter: select highlighted
itemfilters.help_text.nbt:
NBT String
▶ e.g. { text:"hello", value: 1, active: true }
itemfilters.help_text.regex:
Regular Expression
 Matched against the item ID
▶ e.g. "^minecraft:" matches all vanilla items
itemfilters.help_text.max_count:
Maximum Stack Size
▶ May also include relational operators, e.g. "<64" or ">=16"
itemfilters.help_text.damage:
Item Damage
▶ May also include relational operators, e.g. "<10" or ">=5"
 and optionally by percentage, e.g. ">50%"
